Project Profile: 

Project Name : Product Quality Dashboard
Client Name    : Cisco System
Technologies  : Tableau 2018 , Hive , Oracle


Project Quality Dashboard is designed for the PQE’s for their internal monthly review of the quality metrics. To design and develop the metric PQE’s needs to travers different application to gather the data. By the implementation of this initiative Product Quality dashboard is the single source of gathering the different metric required for the internal review.

Role: Software Engineer

Contribution / Highlights  :  

As a Tableau Developer performed the following responsibilities.
· Requirement gathering from client.
· Analysis of data and formation of reuired data.. 
· Examining raw data, drawing conclusions & developing graphical views 
· Designing and Developing reports using Tableau.
· Implemented LOD, Row level security , Actions , Groups , sets as per requirenment.
· Testing Using Oracle 
· Fixes the issues identified in testing phase 
· Performed Production Testing, which ensures that the new system will perform correctly in a production environment and interface correctly with other production systems 
· Making Enhancements in Developed Report according to customer need.
 

	







	

	
Project Profile: 

Project Name : Net Promoter Score
Client Name    : Cisco System
Technologies  : Tableau 2018 , Hive , Shell Scripting , Excel , Sqoop


NPS is Net promotor score, it is feedback given by end user in form of survey when the SR raised by him is closed. Whenever agent closes a CR, it becomes important for Cisco get feedback on overall handling of the case. A survey is sent to random end user based on logic and the data collected through the survey is used to take analytical decisions.

Role: Software Engineer

Contribution / Highlights  :  

As a team member I was actively involved in the below phases of project :
· Involved in various phases of analysis of the existing system.
· I worked on hive for data extraction, loading and scripting.
· Create sqoop script for loading the data from Hadoop system to oracle or vice-versa.
· Worked on shell script as per client requirement.
·  Build dashboard from scratch based on Service request life cycle that helps to end user to get to know how many request we resolved for a given set of time.
· Preparing the analysis documents that will help in identifying the components required for customization.
· Worked in writing scripting for fetching and loading the data from one data source to our NPS system.
·  Provide production support for the deployed project till it is stabilized 

	





	

	
Project Profile: 

Project Name : SSO
Client Name    : Cisco System
Technologies  : Tableau 10.5 , Hive 


SSO is an organization under cisco that provide the services to Global TAC organization in terms of all metrics based on the definition of business. All our delivery platform is IBITS application based on Java that redirect to all existing dashboard to tableau server. For backend perspective, we were using Oracle database and migrated into hadoop.

Role: Software Engineer

Contribution / Highlights  :  

As a team member I was actively involved in the below phases of project :
· Implemented Row level security for restricting the data based on user and User filter.
· Implemented complex requirement involving use of Level of Details.
· Preparing the analysis documents that will help in identifying the components required for customization.
· Worked in Lead Generation, TAC Sales Adoption.. Etc. area.
· Create dashboard in tableau as per client requirement and implemented new features of tableau like cross data source, Level of detail expression, JavaScript API, Data blending, Security etc.
· Also created dashboards using different chart like Bar chart, tabular chart, Pie chart, dual combinations etc. in tableau and publish in tableau server. 
· Development of code as per the business requirements.
· Used Aracadia and Hive connection and worked on migration stuff from oracle to Hadoop.
· Worked in hive and have basic understanding of Hadoop.
· Created Solution Design Specification Document and Functional Document in every release.
· Providing fixes to the issues identified in testing phase.
· Implemented Web data connector in tableau.
· Packaging of the developed component to be deployed in production environment.
· Provide production support for the deployed project till it is stabilized 




	

	
Project Profile: 

Project Name  : TL 9000
Client Name    : Cisco System
Technologies  : Tableau 9 ,  OBIEE 11g , Oracle


This project TL 9000 is a quality standard developed by the Quality Excellence for Suppliers of Telecommunications Forum, better known as the Quest Forum. TL 9000 is a globally recognized quality standard and is designed to improve telecommunications or information and communication technologies (ICT) products and services.

Role: Software Engineer

Contribution / Highlights  :  

As a team member I was actively involved in the below phases of project :
· Involved in various phases of analysis of the existing system.
· Preparing the analysis documents that will help in identifying the components required for customization.
· Preparing the Source to Target documents and there by identify the road map for effective optimization.
· Implemented Repository database create joins, variables, alias, import metadata etc. that were extensively used in the project.
· Create reports in OBIEE as per client requirement and implemented new features of OBIEE like navigation link, prompts, Guided Navigation, Session variable, Presentation variable etc.
· Deploy the code in stage as well as in Production as per standard.
· Also created dashboards using different chart like Bar chart, tabular chart, Pie chart, dual combinations etc. in tableau and publish in tableau server.

· Created Solution Design Specification Document and Functional Document in every release.
